activities:
We collect voluntary information from sales prospects in order to be able to provide them with sales and marketing information about our products.  Some of these sales prospects reside in the EU.
We also offer a hosted support software service to companies that may reside in the EU, and these companies may collect information from their customers.  We do not access or process our customers' customers' information at all.
contactoff1: 460 Seaport Court Suite 200 Redwood City CA 94063
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: We will comply with any legal or regulatory supervisory authorities that provide for handling of individual complaints and dispute resolution; and we are committed to cooperation with data protection authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives.  We will also accept the conclusions of any reputable dispute resolution service.
